product_name: prAna Ryken Flannel Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Enjoy the natural warmth and breathability of wool without the itch in the prAna Ryken Flannel shirt. Watch out, the classic plaid may inspire you to sprout a beard and start chopping firewood. Wool/polyester blend is soft and warm; nylon lining feels comfortable next to skin. Includes a full-zip front and metal buttons. Button-flap chest pockets. prAna Ryken Flannel shirt has a relaxed fit. Dry clean only. Closeout.
short_description: Enjoy the natural warmth and breathability of wool without the itch in the prAna Ryken Flannel shirt. Watch out, the classic plaid may inspire you to sprout a beard and start chopping firewood.
